entry.title: Stainless Steel Vegetable Cooker
entry.summary:
Vendor: Delightkitchen
Type: pot
Price: 31.99

Description :

2 Tier 27.5cm Stainless Steel Food Steamer Pot Pan Vegetable Cooker Glass Lid

- Will work on any induction stove tops.
- 2 Tiers design and ergonomic handle for taking food easily.
- Removable and big capacity, enough space to cook much food.
- Made of stainless steel material, durable, easy cleaning and non-toxic.
- Multiple steam holes make food heat evenly, you can enjoy nutritious and delicious food

Specification :

Material  Stainless Steel + Glass Lid
Color  Silver
Weight  1109.8g
Diameter 27.5 cm

Package Includes :

1 x Stainless Steel Steamer

s:variant.title: 2 Tier 27.5cm Stainless Steel Food Steamer Pot Pan Vegetable Cooker Glass Lid

entry.title: Stainless Steel Tea Pot
entry.summary:
Vendor: Delightkitchen
Type: pot
Price: 21.99

Description :

1/1.5/2/2.5L Stainless Steel Tea Pot Coffee Pot with Tea Strainer Infuser Filter 

- Made of high-grade stainless steel material, durable and not easy to rust.
- The spout is provided with a cap to prevent dust and other impurities from entering the kettle and causing pollution,
and also preventing water from flowing.
- Anti-scalding handle design has a good function of heat insulation and anti-scalding.
- Equipped with a filter to effectively filter tea residue.

Specification :

Material  Stainless Steel
Color  Silver
Capacity 1.0L / 1.5L / 2.0L / 2.5L
4 Size Optional 14cm / 16cm / 18cm / 20cm

Package Includes :

1 x Teapot with Filter (Not included other decorations)

entry.title: Stainless Steel Cooking Spoon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Delightkitchen
Type: Stainless steel spones
Price: 27.99

Description :

5pcs Stainless Steel Cooking Set Spoon Colander Shovel Kitchen Cooking Tools 

5pcs Stainless Steel Cooking Set  are Made of stainless steel, which are durable and healthy.
The cooking set includes a colander, spoon, drain shovel, soup spoon, spatula.
Keeping your kitchen tidy and save a lot space because of hanging hole design.
With ergonomic handle, the cooking set are easy cooking and effortless.

Feature :

Material: Stainless steel
Color: Silver
Size: Colander : 14.2 * 32cm / 4.41'' * 12.6''
          Spoon : 7.4*24.2 cm / 2.91'' * 9.53''
          Drain Shovel : 7.4 * 32.8 cm / 2.91'' *12.91''
          Soup Spoon : 9.5*30.4 cm / 3.74'' * 11.97 '' 
          Spatula : 9.7 * 31.1 cm / 3.82'' * 12.24''

Package Included :

1 x colander
1 x Spoon 
1 x drain shovel 
1 x Soup Spoon
1 x Spatula

s:variant.title: 5Pcs Stainless Steel Cooking Set Spoon Colander Shovel Kitchen Cooking Tools
